titleStmt.title: A country new Iigge betweene Simon and Susan, to be sung in merry pastime by bachelors and maydes. To the tune of I can, nor will no longer lye alone: or, Falero lero lo

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name and date of publication from STC.
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
